note.p: Burial: In the family vault at St Nicholas's chapel, Westminster Abbey

Held various titles: 4th Baronet of Stanwick, Earl of Northumberland in 1750, assumed the name and arms of the Percy's in 1750, and then gained the titles Duke of Northumberland, Earl Percy and Viscount Lovaine of Alnwick in 1766, although the latter was not conferred until 1784.
References: Kevin J Fraser, 'John Hill and the Royal Society in the Eighteenth Century' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 43-67
